name: Slip Cube
description:
- Slip Cube -

Take control of the Blue cube and help it make its way home by touching the green goal cube. However, it is not as simple as it sounds. There will be plenty of obstacles that will get in your way.

- Description -

Slip Cube is a 3D Platformer that can be compared to a maze style game. Slip Cube has a different approach to this and brings unique obstacles to block you.

- System Requirements -If you can see this page and a little Windows logo in the bottom left-hand corner of your screen, you can run this game.
